select: select emotionId, regDate, content1, content2,'gratitudeDiary' as diary, count from oneul.GratitudeDiary where regDate = #{regDate} UNION select emotionId, regDate, content, image, 'freeDiary' as diary, count from oneul.FreeDiary where regDate = #{regDate} UNION select emotionId, regDate, content, image, 'futureDiary' as diary, count from oneul.FutureDiary where regDate = #{regDate}
